description: El Quiche was hit the hardest by the Guatemala's internal armed conflict; at the present, this department shows the high number of cases of social violence, which evidences the need to promote the knowlegde and observance of Human Rights

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: This project will carry out human rights education for indigenous persons in three ways:  a) forming facilitators to carry out training processes; b) training indigenous leaders, who will be prepared to hold activities on the promotion of human rights; and c) community groups and relatives of the participants will be sensitized in the exercise of human rights.
subproject.title: Training Program on HR for Ind

title: Training Program on HR for Indigenous People in Quiche
